Before co-founding Avid Reader Press in 2018, Jofie Ferrari-Adler spent eight years at the Simon & Schuster imprint. Previously he worked at Grove Atlantic, Viking Penguin, and the independent publisher Four Walls Eight Windows, and before that as a bookseller.
